en.for-convenience-keep-checked: For your convenience, keep this checked. On shared devices, additional precautions are recommended.
en.get-instructions-sent-to-email: Get instructions sent to this email that explain how to reset your password.
en.check-email-follow: Check your email - Follow the instructions sent to {email} to recover your password.
en.password-must-contain: The password must contain at least 6 characters.
